title: Y Mountain
address: East of BYU Campus, Provo, UT
description: A steep trail leading to the giant 'Y' overlooking Provo with scenic valley views.

title: Bridal Veil Falls
description: A stunning double cataract waterfall accessible via a paved path or hike.

title: Provo Canyon
description: A scenic drive and recreation area with rafting, hiking, and breathtaking views.

title: Rock Canyon
description: Popular for rock climbing, hiking, and connecting with nature right by the city.

title: Utah Lake
address: Utah Lake State Park, Provo, UT
description: A large freshwater lake great for boating, fishing, and sunset views.

title: Monte L. Bean Life Science Museum
alt: Monte L. Bean Life Science Museum
description: A family-friendly museum with animal exhibits, dioramas, and educational displays.

title: Provo Pioneer Village
description: Experience pioneer life through restored cabins, artifacts, and blacksmith demos.

title: BYU Museum of Art
description: One of the largest and best-attended art museums in the Mountain West.
